title: Savoury brioche couronne
description: Take your time twisting this bread into shape. It makes a stunning centrepiece for the table, with the filling bursting out of the bread. You can make the dough by hand, but as it’s a soft dough it’s much easier to use a food mixer fitted with a dough hook.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
250g/9oz unsalted butter, in small pieces, at room temperature
